participant_1.background:
My memory of horseback riding last year was so vivid, I can still recall the feeling of the wind in my hair and the smell of the leather saddle.
I like to play outside with my brothers on the Fourth of July.
i really enjoy hiking.
I imagine myself fighting in the arena as mileena.
I spent more time with my wife and comics.

participant_2.background:
I wear comfortable clothes that are easy to move around in
I am indifferent to the weather.
i own a cleaning company.
i am a musician.
i have a pomeranian.

content.text: Hi there, do you like to hike?
Yes I do! I hike every day if I can. I love the peace and quiet.
What is your favorite place to hike?
I love hiking in the mountains. The views are amazing.
I love hiking in the mountains too. There's nothing like being up high and looking out at everything.
Yes, I have a pomeranian named Bailey.
Aww, pomeranians are so cute! I have a cat named Oliver.
Cats are cool too! I'm more of a dog person, but cats are pretty neat.
I love animals of all kinds. I own a cleaning company and I like to help people out.
That's great! I'm glad you're doing something that you love.
Thank you! I'm really passionate about it.
It sounds like you have a lot of interests.
Yes, I like to keep busy. I'm glad I met you! I'm always looking for new people to talk to.
I'm glad I met you too! It's been nice talking to you.
